Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides derived from pepsinogens in the stomach of the bullfrog, Rana catesbeiana.
Literature.Author: Minn I, Kim HS, Kim SC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=20µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=50µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans(MIC=30µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=50µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida(MIC=100µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=30µg/ml),Serratia sp.(MIC=50µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=100µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=10µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=40µg/ml)
